comments.author: AdelphiA.9287
comments.body: Well, everything seems to be running smoothly again now so I’m guessing it was just a blip.

comments.author: Drakma.1549
comments.body: I’m not having any issues at all.

comments.author: AdelphiA.9287
comments.body: Is anyone else using Piken Square – EU server and getting long load times when querying event data? Both my apps are freezing for a good 30 seconds before returning any data, but only on events; map and world data are fine.
